Iâm falling asleep as I type and I canât see the screen.

Iâve started to listen and savor your words. I repeat them over and over in my head like a flavor I want to last on my tongue.  Your words are so precious that I replay them in my mind to truly take them in.

Baby, the words you give me are perfect.  Everything you said to me tonight touched my soul and made me feel loved. You decision to be up all night with me and forgo sleep is the other way you show.  You show your love through actions.  I never doubt your love.
My only goal in life is for you to feel loved every day of your life by me.  That is all that matters to me, Bilal.  You and you knowing you are loved.

Your words are beautiful Mrs Hasson! ð

Dear Mr. Hasson, 
You have bewitched me mind, body and soul.  Your wife is ardently in love with you. Your heart is the most precious gift she has ever received.  She will hold you tightly in her arms and keep you safe for all of eternity.
Love always,
Mrs. Hasson
You really are my sun, my moon, and my brightest star!
I look forward to you being whatever you are today.  I look forward to every moment I spend with you. ðð

content: I asked you to leave me. I donât mean it.  Please donât leave me.
I know I was capable of love and loving others, but no one had ever loved me-before you.
When you told me you loved me, it was the greatest gift besides Oliver.  Iâve never been loved before.
You captured my heart the day you said you felt more for me than just liking me.
I believe this is what Oliver wanted, baby donât feel guilty ð§¡ð
You are all I want and all I need. I feel a level of guilt for being this happy.
Bilal, it scares me so happily how much I love you and you love me.
I love you so much I could never hate you
I donât hate you, because I understand you. When you completely understand someone, you love them as though you were them.
Genevieve, in this short time of knowing you Iâve never been this happy. The fact that you think you could ever make me feel anything except love is not a question.
You will never make me miserable! Thatâs just not going to happen
Donât hate those words, feel them, and know that theyâre okay
I not good for you.  Iâm going to make you miserable.
I canât take those words back and I am so ashamed
I fucking hate myself for saying Iâm envious of you and Ramiza
Would you ask someone to cut out their heat? I doing think you would
I hope one day you donât feel damaged, instead we want you to feel a sense of belonging.
I hope one day, Iâll be able to make you feel and know that Oliver loves you and wants you to be happy, to have him in our memories each and every day. To honour him with our love for him

I wish you did too. 

Thatâs a normal thing to feel, I could never hate you
I love seeing pictures of you with Ramiza but Iâm so envious too of what I never got to have
I wish I got to take him home.
I wish it was me, I wish I could have been there for you and Oliver ðð§¡
Bilal, I want to be there in the hospital with him right now.  I want it to be last year.  I want you there with me
I believe he would want to be remembered for all the love he was able to give you. And I believe he would want the pain to slowly go away, and only love to exist in him memory.
He wants you to feel loved, to feel happy. I know that to be true, because I know he led me to you
The pain is all I have left to know it was real
His memory will not fade away, just the pain
I donât think youâre ever taken away from him. I believe he is on this journey with you. And he will guide you each and everyday day.
I donât want it to fade Bilal, every day is another day that takes me further from him.

Time, thatâs the one gift the universe offers freely. The wounds will fade, but will always be there. Every new year, it will fade, more and more. Allow yourself to feel, heal, and continue doing that over and over.

Is the one absolute for me
